original_text: The length of the vestibule was twenty cubits, and the breadth twelve cubits, and people would go up to it by ten steps. And there were pillars beside the jambs, one on either side.
korean_text: 그 현관의 너비는 스무 척이요 길이는 열한 척이며 문간으로 올라가는 층계가 있고 문 벽 곁에는 기둥이 있는데 하나는 이쪽에 있고 다른 하나는 저쪽에 있더라

sentences.original_text: The length of the vestibule was twenty cubits
people would go up to it by ten steps
And there were pillars beside the jambs
